See also: benützen

German[edit]

Alternative forms[edit]

  • benützen (Southern Germany, Austria, Switzerland)

Etymology[edit]

be- +‎ nutzen

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [bəˈnʊtsn̩], [bəˈnʊtsən]
  • benutzen
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

benutzen (third-person singular simple present benutzt, past tense benutzte, past participle benutzt, auxiliary haben)

  1. to use (employ, apply)
